survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Meal Planning Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, usage patterns, and satisfaction levels with meal planning applications to help improve product offerings.

questions.question_text: Do you currently use any meal planning apps?
answer_options: Not currently, but I have in the past
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This question serves as a filter for subsequent questions.

script.question_text: Do you currently use any meal planning apps?
answer_options: Not currently, but I have in the past

questions.question_text: Which meal planning app(s) do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections (checkboxes) since users may use more than one app.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for manual entry.

script.question_text: Which meal planning app(s) do you currently use?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use meal planning apps?
questions.routing_logic: Only if Q1 is 'Yes' or 'Not currently, but I have in the past'
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify the main motivator. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for manual entry.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use meal planning apps?
script.routing_logic: Only if Q1 is 'Yes' or 'Not currently, but I have in the past'

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your current meal planning app(s)?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your current meal planning app(s)?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a meal planning app?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify top-valued features. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for manual entry.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a meal planning app?

questions.question_text: If you do not currently use a meal planning app, what is the main reason?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify barriers to adoption. Include an 'Other' option for nuanced responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for manual entry.

script.question_text: If you do not currently use a meal planning app, what is the main reason?

questions.question_text: What additional features would encourage you to use a meal planning app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying unmet needs.
